ProjectTitle: Urinary tract infections as a trigger of oligodendrogliopathy in multiple system atrophy.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
20/06/2024
Data: please also list and describe the management of samples and/or materials that you will use, these are considered physical data in a DMP
Please check your ethical approval numbers, they are different from the ones that you list in the CMT; are the induced pluripotent stem cells (iPSCs) from human origin? If so please note that these are considered human bodily material and ethical approval is needed, is the S number that you mention in the CMT for the use of these cells? if so please add this number in the DMP, otherwise apply for ethical approval as explained on the ethics website: https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/ethics/guidance/humanmaterial. Please submit an updated DMP with the correct numbers as intermediate
Sharing: if there are no factors restricting sharing, why do you share as restricted instead of open data? Note that RDR will assign a DOI.
